title: LG 420 L Frost Free Double Door 3 Star Refrigerator  (Shiny Steel, GL-I472QPZX)

product_specification.Installation & Demo:
Explain all the functionality of the product
Flipkart will facilitate Installation & Demo at time of your convenience from an brand authorized service engineer
Usage of the product
The authorized service engineer will be providing detailed demo that includes
The Installation & Demo service will be provided free of cost. All additional accessories not part of the the package will be charged separately
Preventive maintenance action to be taken
Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on product and 10 Years Warranty on compressor from LG
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty:
Consumables
Loose Plastic Parts
Glass
Light Bulb

product_description.Smart Inverter Compressor: This is an energy-efficient compressor that adjusts its cooling power according to the amount of food in this refrigerator to save energy. Also, its silent operation ensures that you sleep, work, or do anything else in your home without any disturbance.
product_description.Ice Beam Door Cooling: This technology ensures even and efficient cooling throughout the refrigerator. It circulates cold air from vents, along with the back, to ensure thorough cooling.

review:
Excellent value for money. I purchased for 32500/- after exchanging old fridge. So far very good.
Pro's:
a) This is a 4 Star fridge. Super savings in the long run
b) 420 litres. Huge capacity
c) Silent operation.
d) Installation & Delivery same day.

Cons:
a) Scratches on the freezer door. Improper handling by courier while transporting.
b) Installation technicians explanation is not proper

But overall fridge is functioning excellently. 11.10.2019: After 11 months I am posting this. This product is absolutely fabulous, fantastic, excellent & very good Powe saver. This is a Bee Certified 4-Star Fridge. Good for a family of four. Go for it.

Got at the best exchange value. The advanced and latest model. Great value for money. Working all right. Silent working. Highly recommend.
Only delivery was not promised on the date. I had to continually follow up for delivery.

We had an LG refeigerator before which we used for nearly 20 years.My Mother had instructed me to buy a LG refrigerator only while replacing it as she was very much happy with its performance in these many years.So i had tp ho with this & i got this from Flipkart.This refrigerator has a 4star rating which ultimately lowers your Electricity bill.Its quite spacious inside & also has good storage shelves for keeping different sizes of items.The LED ligjt is quite bright & the compressor doesnt s...
READ MORE
Just completed 1 year and auto defrost is not work properly...executive of LG says freezer door is not closed properly and we have to pay Rs. 767.00 to LG as service charge..not recommended

It was a great deal. I have purchased it around 35k after exchanging my old LG single door refrigerator which was 10 year old. I am using this product since last one week and it is working fine. The freezer area is deep and has space to store lot of things. The vegetable box is good enough to store lot of vegetables and it keeps the vegetable fresh.

Extremely happy about my decision to buy this fridge. Aesthetic design, spaciousness, low noise, good lighting even in the freezer compartment, and various other features make this LG refrigerator a superb choice. Moreover the purchase from Flipkart during their ‘Big Billion Days’ sale saved me a lot of money too…!!! The delivery was on time and the product reached me safe and intact. The installation and demo was done by an LG technician satisfactorily, but it took 2 days after delivery, that too after calling the customer care for speeding up the installation. (LG warranty will be applicable only if the installation and demo is done by their technician)
Overall, I’m extremely happy about my LG 420 ltr double door fridge as of now.
Thank you Flipkart, Thank you LG..!!!
Awesome product

Amazing Packing and superior quality !
Love the design and performance !!
no one came for installation, still in box pack after 4th day. Freeze is osm 👌

Its only been 4 days since the use of the refrigerator, however i am a big fan of LG brand in appliances and they did not disappoint with this fridge. The flipkart delivery was on time and no scratches or dent on the product. The exchange part was not that smooth, the delivery perspn initially did not take the old unit because of their defined quality checks. However later on he agreed, maybe Flipkart can improve this aspect.

The fridge is spacious and has all the required facilities. Door alarm after 1 minute of continuous door open. I never believed in the 5in1 convertible concept and opted this over Samsung. Also the Net space is more in LG comparee to Samsung, ultimately that is what counts the most.

This Refrigerator is one of the best deal I have ever got through the e-Commerce platform. Best Refrigerator in 400-450 ltr segment. I was confused between two of the best models in this range. Samsung 415 ltr and LG 420 ltr. I opted for the LG just because of the after-sales service.

Bought this after using LG 260 litre double door fridge for 15 years.Not a single issue in the old fridge.Just changed it for storage shortage.So we know the performance of the brand LG.My family always go for LG for any home appliances though price is comparatively more.Now coming to this one , as expected performance is excellent.Noise free operation with excellent fast cooling using less power.Only usable space could be utilised more as I think.Awesome delivery experience from flipkart and quick same day installation by LG.Fully satisfied till now.
Very Good Performance

Changed from a whirlpool 450L that was close to 15yrs old. The LG seems quieter and surely more power efficient but can do better on the quality of the interior shelves and space utilisation.

Having said this, we could for all we had in our old fridge into this and still have some space left. This was mainly due to more space in the freezer door where a lot of bottles and boxes could fit in.

Waiting to see the effect on power bills. On paper LG fridges seem to score high on efficiency. Plus the fact that this fridge can run on a inverter during power cuts. This is a Huge advantage..

answers: A:This is a 4 Star rated refrigerator, giving you Energy Savings of upto 40% approximately.
A:Digital Inverter Compressor intelligently varies its power and running speed according to immediate cooling requirement of the compressor.
A:its a normal double door, it has a convertible box in the middle, thats the only part convertible
A:Gross Volume 420 litres. Storage Volume 388 litres.
A:I do not know what this method is. But we are storing in this in a hygienic way only.
A:No. It has an inbuilt stabilizer
A:It says 230 units/year...I have a 5 year old 5 star 190litre refrigerator which claims to consume 197 units/year.
A:230 units per year (around 20 units per month) under standard operating conditions i.e. both refrigerator and freezer at medium setting. This is as per the BEE rating sticker on the refrigerator.
A:not required. The model works without stabilizer 100v -290v . It gives protection against fluctuations.
A:Nope, only the top portion is freezer and the bottom portion is regular refrigerator
A:Lg 420 Litres frost free 4 star refrigerator
A:You can keep piece of coal or any fragrance spray to remove
A:Approx... 52 x 34 cm.. If you buy few cm more it may stick out a bit
A:I had purchased the above refrigerator and found it faulty within a week. So i say NO
A:It doesn't need a stabilizer as per the manual.
A:This is a 4 Star fridge consuming 230units in a year.
